CustomField.formula: Account__r.BillingStreet & IF( LEN( Account__r.BillingCity)>0, BR() & Account__r.BillingCity ,"") & IF( LEN( Account__r.BillingState)>0,BR() & Account__r.BillingState ,"") & IF( LEN( Account__r.BillingPostalCode)>0,BR() & Account__r.BillingPostalCode ,"") & IF( LEN( Account__r.BillingCountry)>0,BR() & Account__r.BillingCountry ,"")
CustomField.label: Account Address Copy
